title: Dragon Age: Pals Adventure Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the characters in the mobile game Dragon Age: Pals Adventure. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier.
heading: Dragon Age: Pals Adventure Tier List
introText: This is a tier list for the characters in the mobile game Dragon Age: Pals Adventure. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. S Tier characters are the best in the game, while C Tier characters are the worst. The list is based on the characters' overall power, versatility, and usefulness. However, it is important to note that this is just a tier list, and your own personal preferences may vary. There is no right or wrong answer when it comes to choosing the best characters in Dragon Age: Pals Adventure. The most important thing is to choose characters that you enjoy playing and that fit your playstyle.

data.itemDescription: Morrigan is a powerful mage with a variety of spells that can deal damage, control enemies, and support her allies. She is also a good choice for players who want a character with a strong personality and backstory

Alistair is a versatile warrior who can tank damage, deal melee damage, and support his allies with his Templar abilities. He is also a good choice for players who want a character with a strong moral compass
Leliana is a rogue who can deal ranged damage, stealth, and support her allies with her Bard abilities. She is also a good choice for players who want a character with a religious background
Varric is a rogue who can deal ranged damage, stealth, and support his allies with his Artificer abilities. He is also a good choice for players who want a character with a sarcastic sense of humor
Cassandra is a warrior who can tank damage, deal melee damage, and support her allies with her Divine abilities. She is also a good choice for players who want a character with a strong sense of duty
Bull is a warrior who can tank damage, deal melee damage, and support his allies with his Reaver abilities. He is also a good choice for players who want a character with a berserker playstyle

Iron Bull is a warrior who can tank damage, deal melee damage, and support his allies with his Berserker abilities. He is a good choice for players who want a character with a berserker playstyle. However, he is not as well-rounded as some of the other warriors on this list

Sera is a rogue who can deal ranged damage, stealth, and support her allies with her Artificer abilities. She is a good choice for players who want a character with a unique personality. However, she can be a bit unreliable in combat

Dorian is a mage who can deal damage, control enemies, and support his allies with his Necromancer abilities. He is a good choice for players who want a character with a dark and edgy personality. However, he is not as powerful as some of the other mages on this list

Vivienne is a mage who can deal damage, control enemies, and support her allies with her Rift Mage abilities. She is a good choice for players who want a character with a sophisticated personality. However, she is not as versatile as some of the other mages on this list

Blackwall is a warrior who can tank damage, deal melee damage, and support his allies with his Templar abilities. He is a good choice for players who want a character with a stoic personality. However, he is not as powerful as some of the other warriors on this list

The Inquisition is a party of characters that can be recruited throughout the game. They are a good choice for players who want to experiment with different team compositions. However, they are not as well-developed as some of the other characters on this list
